creator: mullangi13@yahoo.com
text:
we are developing an application using struts1.3 framework. We are deploying the developed application in tomcat5.5 server.

We have a page,in which there is a link to a file.when the user clicks on the link to open file,we observed that parallely this operation is creating files  either in tomcat_home direcotry or in tomcat_home /bin directory.

Please help us to resolve this issue. Please respond asap because this is an urgent requirement to deliver.

Thanks & Regards,
Ram
Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the users mailing list.
creator: markt@apache.org
